full_text: Kingdom Hospital  is a thirteen-episode television series based on Lars von Trier's The Kingdom , which was developed by horror writer Stephen King in 2004 for American television. While initially conceived as a mini-series, it was later changed into a regular television series . It was first aired on ABC on March 3 and concluded on July 15, 2004 after being put on hold during NBA playoffs.
